channel.title: Feudalism 317
channel.description:
Feudalism is a new little project I am going to develop off and on. Although I am not as into RSPSs as I used to be, I hope to finish this.
The server itself is intended to be "old school" where there is no god swords or curse prayers that I see in today's 317s. The client is a black 317 deob loading the 377 cache and no customs will be added.
[b]Base: Shard[/b]
[b]Combat [PvP & PvN][/b] Melee - All specials work - Correct weapon animations - Timing - Block animations Ranged Magic
[b]Skills[/b] Firemaking - No walking backwards after lighting a log Woodcutting - No stumps Thieving Fishing Cooking Crafting - Craft leather and dragon hide Prayer - All work except for Smite
[b]Miscellaneous[/b] - Full Taverly dungeon - Cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness - Cannot teleport while in combat - Deposit box
[b]Pictures[/b] [img]http://img862.imageshack.us/img862/6051/79979705.jpg[/img] [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/643/magev.jpg[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/9336/pvph.jpg[/img] [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/4480/specvh.jpg[/img] [img]http://img852.imageshack.us/img852/5069/35931268.jpg[/img] [img]http://img859.imageshack.us/img859/2580/thieving.jpg[/img] [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/3188/range.jpg[/img]

item.title: Feudalism 317
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Good luck, I hope to see this succeed, as I am partially trying to achieve the same goal.

Also, if you are recruiting, I would love to join.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You still need to put some more effort into the thread, but I’m impressed with using that GameFrame and using a classic server.

Good luck with the development.
